can someone help me?: Did you try to install the 64bit firefox package from ubuntu that I directed you to earlier?

No, the 64 bit version directly from Ubuntu is here: http://security.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/f/firefox-3.0/firefox-3.0_3.0.10+nobinonly-0ubuntu0.9.04.1_amd64.deb      Note the "amd64" part in the name which designates 64bit
If you download that file, you can install it with: sudo dpkg -i firefox-3.0_3.0.10+nobinonly-0ubuntu0.9.04.1_amd64.deb
